rBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L

res.rBody:
Hoc signum crucis erit in caelo cum dominus ad iudicandum venerit tunc manifesta erunt abscondita
cordis nostri cordis vestri
alleluia alleluia
silent reading

vBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L

verses.vBody: Cum sederit filius hominis in sede maiestatis suae et coeperit iudicare saeculum per ignem

rep.wit: CAO-C CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L
